{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3431372,"name":"Elliot S","username":"ElliotS","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/elliots/{size}/177628_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T00:22:44.073Z","cooked":"

Extremely quick background on 254’s 2017 robot for “normal” people:

  • Won 5 blue banners, 2 Regionals, Worlds Division, St. Louis Worlds, and Festival of Champions
  • #2 in the world for EPA

If people want to reply to this thread please read 254’s amazing technical binder first, it will answer many of your questions!

Actual Message:

Hi anyone on 254,

I am working on making a robot concept for the WCP design challenge and I now started working on making an intake for the ELECTROLYTES game piece that is a 5” diameter wiffle balls same as the “fuel” game piece from the 2017 game. I want to copy your intake from that year so I know that the dimensions I land on have a high likelihood of working. I know this is not needed for a CADathon but is good practice for a real season. Following the motto of “Steal from the best, invent the rest” I want to ask the anyone that I know have a good working design before I try to sketch something else up. I have some main questions listed here:

  1. Do you mind posting any screen shots of your cad if you can find it with the spastic intake dimensions. I know some info from your tech binder but it would be good to also know the roller c-c distance and the distance off the ground the first roller is.

  2. Are there any major lessons learned from making the ball path of that robot? Things that worked well, things to avoid?

  3. With the drivetrain of choice now being swerve would you have changed anything about your robot design from that year?

Links:

Team 254 Presents: 2017 Misfire Technical Binder and Build Blogs Technical Discussion
Team 254 is proud to present the Technical Binder and the Build Blogs for our 2017 robot: Misfire. If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
WCP CADathon 2024: DunkTank General Forum
[Charlie Dunk Tank_Long] We are excited to present our first CADathon! Our goal is to use this as an opportunity to connect with the community in a fun and exciting way! Signup Link: https://forms.gle/eZKkdfr7hXy9Vkad6 Game Manual Live! The CADathon will begin on 10/04/2024 with the game manual reveal for WCP DunkTank at 12:00pm PST. Teams will have about one week to design a robot for the game, as well as create documentation describing their strategies and robot functions. Submissions wil…
